name: Space Crusaders
description:
Try to survive the demon onslaught in this fast-paced top-down shooter. Battle oncoming enemies as they try to destroy you, collect their souls to level up your character and weapons. Collect relics and unlock new characters and weapons to become more powerful!

As the player, you have a collection of weapons and equipment you can choose from to ensure maximum survival against the enemy. Specific combinations of upgrades, weapons and items will work together in synergy to produce crazy and exciting results!
Relics that stay with your character between levels, and gear collected and upgraded within levels will apply modifiers to every weapon in your inventory, producing insane damage, health. movement speed and more.
